group_1.textLeft: Mami... Wasn't that a strange Witch we@just fought?

group_1.textRight: Yes...
It wouldn't be unexpected if the Witch that had@escaped back then migrated to Kamihama,
but I never imagined she would still retain@all the same injuries we had dealt...
What's it matter?
We have no clue how individual Witches@are different from each other,
so it's not all that surprising those injuries@are still there.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
It seems like she could've been attacked@by another Magical Girl, too.

group_1.textRight: But the funny thing is that Madoka's arrow@was still there.

group_1.textLeft: Oh, you noticed, too, Homura?

group_1.textRight: Yeah...
What are you guys talking about?

group_1.textLeft: The arrow that I had shot the Witch with@was still sticking out of her.
The magic I infused was there, too.
It's odd that it hasn't faded away by now...

group_1.textRight: Huh? That Witch got away from you guys@a long time ago, right?

group_1.textLeft: That's correct.
Ordinarily, the magic we unleash dissipates@over time.
The fact that it still remains indicates it hasn't diminished in months...
How weird...

group_1.textRight: Something strange might be going on.
It might be good if we let Iroha know...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I'll give her a call.

group_1.textRight: Um, hello, is this Madoka?
Have you arrived in Kamihama yet?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, we got off at Chuo Ward, and we're@on our way over.
But just a little while ago, we ran into@an unusual Witch...

group_1.textRight: An unusual Witch… Say, can you describe@it more?

group_1.textLeft: ...So it was weird because it's one that@escaped from us months ago...

group_1.textRight: W-what...? That...that means...
W-wait a minute!
T-Toukaaaaaa!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:200101:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Iroha? Are you okay?!

group_1.textRight: Oh, s-sorry! Would it be okay if I hang up@for a second?

group_1.textLeft: Um, sure...

group_1.textRight: I'm really sorry about this!@I'll call you back shortly!
What was that about?

group_1.textLeft: She sounded so distressed...

group_1.textRight: It sounds like something strange might've@happened in Kamihama after all...

group_1.textLeft: If it's alright with you guys, can we wait@for her to call back?

group_1.textRight: Yes.
We don't know what's happening either,@so let's stay here.
Ain't no point in just hangin' around in the station.@Why don't we pop into a shop somewhere?

group_1.textLeft: What an astounding coincidence!

group_1.textRight: I cursed the heavens for putting us in this@predicament, but they haven't forsaken us yet.
Anyway, I asked Madoka to explain it@in more detail.
She said that in the past, there have been several@instances of Witches disappearing from Mitakihara.
The Witch they just fought is one of them...
So all those Witches from the Mirrors offshoot@you were talking about...

group_1.textLeft: If there's an offshoot Mirrors in the Mitakihara@of the past, and another one in Chuo Ward,
then they may be connected.
Yeah, that must be it!
Alright, atteeeeention, please!
You mind if I give you some instructions, Big Sis?

group_1.textRight: Yes, that's just what I was about to ask!

group_1.textCenter: Okay, we're operating under the assumption that@the Witches in Chuo Ward have come from the@Mitakihara of the past.
I'll explain what we all need to do, but only once.
If you want to relay this to other people,@take a video and send it to them.

group_1.narration: "First, Nemu and I will figure out@how to prevent paradoxes from occurring,@assuming these Witches are from Mitakihara."
"After that, we'll need to make contact with Kyubey@in one of the neighboring towns."
"I'm sure his network is aware of what was happening@in Mitakihara a few months ago."
"So if they know there were Witches that disappeared@back then, I'd like to get a specific amount."
"In the meantime, I'd like for Mifuyu and the@Amane sisters to investigate Endless Mirrors!"
"The Labyrinth terminal has many mirrors@that can transport entities to other places,@so I want you three to seek and destroy the ones@linked to Chuo Ward and the Mitakihara of the past."
"It would be best if you could identify them both,@since they're connected as "matching mirrors,"@but even just destroying one should be@good enough to stop the breach!"
"All other Magical Girls we can reach@are tasked with slaying the Witches!"
"For those who have visited us from Mitakihara,@I'm sorry to ask this of you, but I'd appreciate it@if you could cooperate with us on this."
"Considering these are Witches you've fought before,@your experience would be particularly useful."
"Don't use the Grief Seeds of the Witches you defeat!"
"We don't know what impact it might have on you."

group_1.textRight: In summary, our primary task is to deal@with these invading Witches.

group_1.textLeft: But once we defeat them,
we won't be able to use the Grief Seeds@we obtain...

group_1.textRight: We'll have to make do without, then.

group_1.textLeft: Yeah.
While Iroha and the others are trying to stop@the Witches from coming to Kamihama,
we have to defeat the ones here before@anyone gets hurt.

group_1.textRight: The past and the present... I sure hope@this doesn't get too weird...

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I hope so, too...
